title: Mourner trousers

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mourner trousers are part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mourner trousers
Mourner trousers

Advanced data
Item ID6067

The mourner trousers are part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting.

When the player first obtains the trousers they are ripped and must be repaired. Players need to take two silks and a bear fur to Oronwen, the Elven Seamstress in Lletya, to have the trousers repaired.

If you already have a full mourner's set you can enter the Mourner's headquarters and go to the basement and kill a level 122 Mourner to get another Mourner's set, including a pair of trousers that will not need to be repaired.

This, along with the rest of the mourner gear cannot be used to enter the incinerator area north of West Ardougne.

[[File:Mourner trousers detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''mourner trousers''' are part of the [[mourner gear|mourner set]]. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 [[Mourner]] on the path to [[Prifddinas]]. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a [[stat restore potion]] before fighting.

When the player first obtains the trousers they are [[Ripped mourner trousers|ripped]] and must be repaired. Players need to take two silks and a bear fur to [[Oronwen]], the Elven Seamstress in [[Lletya]], to have the trousers repaired.

If you already have a full mourner's set you can enter the Mourner's headquarters and go to the basement and kill a level 122 Mourner to get another Mourner's set, including a pair of trousers that will not need to be repaired.

This, along with the rest of the mourner gear '''cannot''' be used to enter the incinerator area north of [[West Ardougne]].
